div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1554 Syria?, before 1917 Burial: c. 148 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 17 AR Antiochus IV: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia, Se- ries II) Demetrius I: 12 tetradr. (Antiocheia, 9 of Series I, 3 of Series II) Alexander I Bala: 4 tetradr. (Antiocheia, 2 dated yr. 164) Disposition: Istanbul Seen by M
